jackpot.description: Adds the Round Number times 3 as bonus damage

heal.description: Heals you equal to the damage you do this round

tank.description: Increase armor by 2 times the damage you do

retaliate.description: Deal bonus damage equal to missing health

cut.description: Deal Direct Damage to Enemyâ€™s Health (Ignores Armor)

desolate.description: Deal Double Damage to Armor (No Damage to Health)
